outputs.output_descr: strengthen national efforts in reducing the threat of terrorism and radicalization, especially among youth and vulnerable marginalized societal groups, to ensure the continued stabilization of Jordan.
Women Economic Empowerment through implementing projects on vocational training and employment.
PVE with preventive measures for social stabilization. To support the stabilisation of Jordan through a comprehensive set of interventions for PVE.
To support the establishment  of local tourism services  in cooperation with the Local Authorities enhancing local capacity building of the target group in implementing their development projects.

To support the establishment  of local small- scale food processing industries  in cooperation with the Local Authorities enhancing local capacity building of the target group in implementing their development projects.
To assist enhancing community security services and access to justice in host communities and other critical areas in Jordan
